TEXT.TITLE: HARLYN PRODUCTS <HRLN> WINS CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Harlyn Products Inc said its Paramount Wedding Ring division has received an order of more than one mln dlrs from a major department store chain. The company did not identify the department store. Reuter
